choices: A big bag of feed, you're on a farm!
A tree root, you're in a forest!
A wall of grass, you're on the savannah!
A sleeping giant tiger, welcome to the jungle!
1.content:
"Ahhhhh" You yawn, stepping onto the metro bus on your way to work. It's a bit of a stormy morning, and the bus is full of people like you, commuters on their way to work. As you take a seat, you rest. The bus closes its doors and moves away from the stop.

As you go along, the bus suddenly stops, jarring you from your seat.

"What the-" the driver says, trying to start the bus.

In a sudden flash of light, you lose consciousness.

Waking up, you look around. A giant barrier blocks your view of the windows.

"Where are we?" You ask.

Looking out the window closer, you notice that you're blocked by-
1.title: On the bus

choices: Get out and explore... toward the bedding!
You're hungry, get out and move toward the bag...
Uh oh! Here comes a hoof...
11.content:
In front of the bus rested a large bag. A rather MASSIVE cloth bag, when you stepped back to look out a glass portion of the roof, you could make out some English writing on it.

"HORSE FEED, OATS."

Damn. You remember your time on a farm... all the sweaty work you had to do, all the-

The stink hits the bus, you can tell due to people bending over and holding their noses closed. You sniff- there's only one scent- horses. You appear to have appeared in some sort of giant barn!

"We...shrunk?" The person you sat next to gasps.

"What's gonna happen to us?" A young woman whined

"We'll be fine- I know we will" A businessman replied.

"Whatever we do... we have to do something!" You shout, looking around the bus. The driver opens the door.

"Stay here or go... it's your choice"
11.title: A big bag of feed, you're on a farm!

choices: To the bus! Get outta here!
It's a teenage girl, (no horse) Stall mucking time! And ya can't get to the bus!
It's a girl AND her horse! And you can't get to the bus!
111.content:
You and your group disembark from the bus. Immediately, you step down into what appears to be wood shavings, remains of a tree made to ensure that a horse is comfortable when in a stall, a massive one from your perspective. You walk along it, until you encounter your first, massive obstacle. A large greenish-blackish mass, rather, several of them lumped close together. Your bus full of city-folk is curious. One person walks right up to it, and sticks his hand in.

"It's warm... looks like there's oats in it, what is it?"

"I dunno, but it's a mountain" someone else says.

"It's..." you interrupt. "A pile of horse poop." Everyone gasps. They're so tiny that it even looks like a mountain out there! If the horse's droppings are a mountain..."

"EWWW WHAT SMELLS?" another person says, looking at a stained portion of bedding. Big, to your size.

"Horse pee. We're in his house AND bathroom!" you say. "Maybe it's' a good idea to get back to the bus..."

Suddenly, the door outside opened... footsteps coming toward them!
111.title: Get out and explore... toward the bedding!

choices: The horse sees the oats around the bus and is hungry
What happens to the 2 guys in the wheelbarrow
1112.content: The stalls gate slides open and a teenage giantess steps in carrying a pitch fork. The city folk as so mesmerized they for get about getting to the bus. In one movement the girl scoops up and tosses 2 city blocks worth of bedding. After another 2 scoops they panic and try to run for the bus, but she has already reached your area. You hear a scream, as a pile of horse poop falls from the pitch fork, onto the 2 guys who had stuck their hands in it. You didn't even get so see if he lived or not cause she scooped up the pile with the next sweep. Although you though you head a scream for help as it was tossed into the wheelbarrow. Your all scrambling for the bus when you hear the feed bag topple over between you all and the bus. Cutting off access. The girl comes back and spreads new bedding. You all huddle near the food bag. Which from here you can see a pile oats had fell out on the floor. The girl comes over and stands the bag back up. Spreading the oats around the bus. Not long after, she leads back the hoarse and shuts the door.
1112.title: It's a teenage girl, (no horse) Stall mucki...

choices: the boy gets up and tucks the Yankie back into his pants along with the covers m
the boy tosses the hankie in the barrow and leaves the barn
11123.content: A young man approaches the wheelbarrow to take it out of the barn his girlfriend tattoos him on the shoulder to kids him and he turns around. You notice one of the guys I the room of the barrow that the boy was now slightly leaning against. The little man jumps and grabs hold of the young giants back pocket. The other man climbs to the top of the barrow and jumps and the boy bends siren to pick up a ring that slipped off his girlfriend finger you notice he landed the boys. "Oh, sorry look at me showing up to talk with you dressed like a slob" he said as he tucked his shirt and the man in his pants. The other man lost balance and slipped but was save by grabbing hold of the boys hankie. The girl said "glad to know I don't have to do this by myself". The boy boys and suggests she go in and cook up some of that leftover chili he would Handel it from here. The thought of the girl must have gotten him quite horny because he walked over and say near the Fed bag and begun to masturbate. The boys atomic made a gurgle and he let out a smelly fatty that put the barn animals to Shame. You felt that of that man in his pants want dead yet he soon would be. The boy finished up and reached fur his hankie to clean up you see the other man's lol of horror as he is pressed against the erupting passion of this young man.
11123.title: What happens to the 2 guys in the wheelbarrow

113.content:
The air around this time in the bus was generally calm, the passengers taking a liking to their new situation.

"Hey... now I can eat an ice cream sandwich forever!" One male passenger joked.
"If you can reach it!" A female replied. The bus sat running in the barn, set into the straw.

Outside the barn however...

"Alright big fella!" A young teenage girl dismounted from her tall, powerful stallion. Winchester, as he was called, strode into the barn while his owner walked back towards the house.

Inside the bus, everyone noticed how it got a bit... darker. Within seconds, a tall black shadow stood over the bus. You look outside, up at the horse that just recently appeared. Winchester swayed around in the stable, the horse neighing, each one shaking the windows and everyone inside.

"What IS that thing?"

"That's a horse!"

"A horse?"

Winchester's tail swayed, the horse trying to turn himself around. A hoof crashed right outside the bus, oblivious to the 'insiders.'

"We've gotta get out of here!" The bus driver shouted, trying to move the bus. Too late, it was stuck in the bedding.

Down came Winchester's hoof!

CRUNCH. Reducing the bus below to a crushed sandwich, pulpy red goo stuck to the horse's hoof.

Guess you're at...
113.title: Bus VS Hoof

12.content: You're surprised more at the fact that a tree root stopped the bus than the fact that you're in a forest. You step out and walk a bit before you feel something's eyes on you, you look to see a really large...
12.title: A giant forest

122.content: What kind of bird is it?
122.title: Bird

124.content: It was a colossal, male, and spotless whitetailed deer. It notices the bus. After seeing it, it walks over to it. Everyone started screaming as it..
124.title: Deer

choices: You are saved. You tell the others to get on
The deer saved you for something special
1242.content: The buck was eating grass and the car sized acorns. Slowly making it's way over to the bus. People in the bus started screaming even though you tried to get people to calm down. But who would when a giant animal that could kill all of you. The bucks ears picked up the sounds and it was curious. It walked over slowly pawing at the ground making mini earthquakes to you. The deer got the the bus and started sniffing. "Nobody say a word" you whispered. The bucks nose hit the bus nearly tipping it over. People started screaming again which confused the deer more. The deer was getting frustrated and blew on the bus and pawed it making it tip over. He then looked down in the big side windows seeing you in the bus. The deer was intrested and hit the bus with an antler causing the metal to rip open like a can of sardines. The deer interested in what he found picked up a few people with his giant maw and put them in his mouth. Spit and giant molars show as the deer smacked them around with the giant tongue. He eventually swallowed but found the taste gross be he still liked the little humans. He looked at your group and your eyes met. His black eyes the size of you met. You started to run but deer and very fast and agile so it took him less then a second to catch you. You thought you where doomed but he picked you up with his lips and turned his head over his back and dropped you on.
1242.title: Sniffs the bus!

choices: Scream and Attempt to get out (again)
1251.content:
(It's night so yall can't see very well)

A gorgeous black and silver wolf emerges from the overgrowth. Her paws barely cause a tremor even for you and your little bus. The moonlight shines on her pelt, silver flashes occurring here and there. Her eyes are an icy blue and are have narrow, slit-like pupils. Her head is raised and her nose is twitching. Then she looks over at the small bus. Cocking her head to the side in a curious manner, she softly pads over. Yall are still trying to see each other when the wolf sets her paw right on top of the bus, causing a slight but not dangerous cave in of the roof. Everyone on the bus freezes. The wolf takes her paw off and the roof resets, the metal groaning. Everyone starts freaking out, but the windows and doors are all stuck, EVEN THE BACK EMERGENCY EXIT! The wolf lays down in front of the bus and her body curling around it clockwise and her tail is on resting against the tires on the left side. She rested her muzzle on the bus' hood, which also groaned under the weight. She was doing it carefully, so it was light enough that the bus didn't bend, but heavy enough that the metal groaned and it was noticeable. Everyone is staring at the giant muzzle in the front window. How do they react?
1251.title: Wolf

12512.content: No one moves as they watch the giant muzzle on the hood. The lips part and a giant tongue licked the window. The wet muscle then went back into the mouth. Someone got everyone's attention and told everyone a plan they had come up with. However, they had barely opened their mouths when a howl was heard. That got everyone's attention, including the wolf's, who howled back. Another howl was heard and the wolf responded. The wolf then got to her feet and picked up the bus, her fangs hooking onto the bars that blocked the windows. With that, she ran into the woods, causing everyone in the bus to hold on to avoid collisions.
12512.title: Silence

125121.content: The wolf ran through the forest and came to a cave. She gently set down the bus onto its wheels, then looked into the cave and made a short howl. Soon, A girl the same size as you came out. The wolf lowered her snout to the girl, who stroked her snout. The wolf looked submissive to the girl despite being several times larger. The wolf motioned with her head towards the bus and the girl walked over. Some of the windows were scratched from the teeth and there was wolf saliva on the window. The girl broke the door, with the help of the wolf, and entered the bus, gazing at all the cowering people. She motioned to the wolf and the wolf picked the bus up again and walked towards the cave. Do you stay in the bus or jump out the door?
125121.title: Continue

1251212.content: You decide against jumping out as it may be dangerous. The wolf carries the bus into the cave and soon you can't see anything. You feel the bus being set down, then something barks. Suddenly, the cave is lit up by fireflies. The cave floor is grass and plants. Moss and vines were growing along the walls. However, the bus was on a section of the cave which had a normal stone floor. The girl was gone, but the wolf was acting like an excited puppy, on her stomach and wagging her tail. She stood up and, carefully using her paw, knocked the bus onto its side. Everyone inside, including you, are suddenly tossed to the side, landing on the windows. The bus was rolled again onto its top. Everyone fell again onto the roof of the bus. Using her claw, the wolf tore off the emergency door and then using her paws, held the bus in nosedive position. You can guess what happened inside. The wolf opened her mouth and clamped it around the now open emergency exit. Her lower fangs were behind the tires and her upper fangs pierced the roof. She then tried to poke her tongue through but only succeeded in spilling saliva into the bus, making the backs of the seats really wet and slippery. The wolf whined, but then lifted the bus into the air. Everyone including you fell towards the door, the majority (amazingly) falling through the door frame. Their attempts to hold onto the frame were futile as it was wet with saliva. Do you fall in?
1251212.title: Stay in the bus.

12512121.content: Unfortunately, your attempts to hold on fail and you fall through the doorway. You land on the wolf's tongue and when the bus is empty, the wolf lowers her head and sets down the bus while keeping everyone in her mouth. Shutting her mouth, she rolls her tongue around, coating everyone before lifting her head and swallowing. The bulges are not even visible in her throat. She then lay down on her side and fell asleep. Now what?
12512121.title: Yes.

125121212.content: Somehow you managed to avoid the worst, but are caught by your shirt on a fang.
125121212.title: I'm stuck between her fangs.

choices: Nothing, but there is a deep hole.
1253.content: More choices, if you choose raccoon then it is a male raccoon and very hungry...
1253.title: More!

choices: Moves you towards his mouth (oral vore)
Moves you towards his penis (cock vore)
12531.content: Out of nowhere your small body is grabbed and you are rushed off into a small hole, your captor looks at you through its bandit mask like fur, you look back, you see it is a male but you do not see a female around. Thinking you are food the raccoon licks you, however due to your size you would not make much more than a snack to the small raccoon. You fear what he will do. Suddenly he........
12531.title: Male raccoon

choices: Surrender and just wait to be eaten and digested painfully
Run from the Eagle and potentially fall to your death
12532.content:
Your walking around and suddenly a large Eagle swoops down and grabs you, you ascend in its talons away from the ground, if you were to fall you would surely die, the Eagle lands in its nest and inspects you. You could run for it but if you fell you would be reduced to nothingness. You get scared and watch the Eagle, it could devour you at any point and you would suffer a digestive death as birds usually do not have teeth.
What do you do
12532.title: Eagle

choices: something falls on top of you
13.content: Everyone seemed as confused as you were. You looked around, although there wasn't much to see. Several minutes later
13.title: A wall of grass, you're on the savannah!

choices: She wants to sniff some more
131.content:
You suddenly hear a deafening boom, followed by a large quake. The bus shakes wildly, nearly bouncing off the ground. The monstrous thump is followed closely by a second one, upon this the bus windows shatter violently. Before the battered passengers could begin to brace again, a third and even more powerful quake rattled the buss, causing the tires to blow out in practical unison.
A moment went by before you tried cautiously to get up. Rising to your feet you peered out the window, glimpsing a massive shadow, just as it began to eclipse the bus. You leaned in to get a better view, and are shocked to see the monolithic object more clearly. Two immense caves of pink flesh surrounded by a soft gray hide filled your view, you question weather this could really be an elephants trunk, as it appeared so obviously to be.
You're answered when the curious behemoths nostrils flex, sucking in a hurricane of the surrounding air deep into her sinuses. The bus creaks against the harsh wind, before grinding roughly against the ground as the immense suction pulls it closer.
131.title: an elephant finds the bus

choices: Dark clouds. A storm is coming.
133.content: Your moment of awe is interrupted by the starting of an engine. The bus was still operational. An uplifting cheer is issued to the driver when he slams the pedal and the bus dashes forward. Most people sit down and enjoy the safari, but you walk up to the driver and ask him how much gas there is left. He says there should be enough to get somewhere and you nod with appreciation, but you can't help wondering where somewhere is. You seem to be in the wildest part of Africa, after all. You have a seat right behind the driver and stare out of the window. Most of the time your view is blocked by tall grass, but occasionally you get a glimpse of a magnificent sight. Your about to drift of when you begin hearing a faint rumbling. You ask the driver what's going on, but he only points forward. Looking over his shoulder you see...
133.title: the driver starts driving

1332.content:
The bus approaches a cloud of dust in which you can see clear shapes of zebras. The driver slows to a halt and switches to reverse. He seems calm, but you can feel panic in him. At first you feel like telling him to drive on, but then you start feeling the same sort of panic. You saw the leading zebra trample a blade of grass under its humongous hoof. The same could easily happen to you. Quickly, people begin realizing the seriousness of the situation and the bus is filled with panic. Some people begin screaming and others bark random orders at the driver. The driver is too baffled by the mayhem and for a moment simply stares at the incoming herd. He quickly recovers himself and begins turning the bus around, but it is too late. The herd catches up with you. Hooves slam down all around you. The ground shakes and dust flies everywhere. The driver stops the bus in its tracks clearly realizing that there was nowhere to go. People come up to the driver and shout at him telling him to drive. Others try to brake through the doors whilst the rest simply loose it and just scream. A select few (including you) just curl up and hope for the best. Just in the nick of time you look out the window to see a dirty hoof coming at you. You hear the breaking of glass as the bus is thrust in the air. Everyone tumbles about inside. You slam your shoulder hard against the seat opposite of you. Someone's high-heel scraps your face. Your elbow slams against someone's face. The bus crashes onto the ground and rolls over a few times before slamming against a rock. You lay still, waiting for death to take you. But it never does.

After who knows how long you dare to open one eye. The bus seats hang above you. You turn your head left and are greeted by light peeking through the broken windows. You turn your head right and gasp. Next to you lies a crushed and bloody face. The person was dead. You quickly look away in horror. Immediately you try to pull yourself out of the wreck. Shards of glass cut through your skin, but you keep on crawling. The dead face was too horrifying to lay next to. Finally you make it out of the bus and see a fair amount of survivors already outside. One of them notices you and helps you out. You inspect your body. No serious wounds. A few minor cuts and bruises. You were lucky. Then you inspect your surroundings. You see zebras grazing everywhere. At least they were not stampeding about. You are surprised at the amount of people still alive and more were still being pulled out of the wreck. You decide to make yourself useful and help when the sun is blocked by a huge shadow. You look up and see the gigantic muzzle of a zebra who had taken interest in your group. Some people scream and start running. Most people keep their nerve and remain still, but a group takes off into the grass and one woman dashes the opposite direction alone. You realize that she was making her way to the bushes away from the zebras which was without doubt pretty smart compared to the people running towards them. As the zebra's muzzle descends you make your choice.
1332.title: A herd of zebras.

13321.content: You decide to remain still. Zebras are herbivores after all and running would only provoke it. The giant muzzle is concentrated on you and comes only inches away from your body. The people around you slowly back away. Unsure of what to do you stay your ground and wait for the zebra to make the first move. A suction on air tugs at your body when the zebra sniffs. You've always wanted to touch a zebra, but doubt if such a move would be wise. Perhaps it would be best to simply back away.
13321.title: The Zebra

133211.content:
You gather your courage and reach out your arm. There is a slight shiver in the zebra's nostrils the moment your hand makes contact. You give the muzzle a tap and the zebra snorts. You jump back in shock. The others prepare to run. You expect a hoof to land on you, but instead the zebra leans forward and nuzzles you. You almost loose your balance in the process, but manage to stay up by hugging the huge muzzle. You expect the zebra to loose interest quickly, but instead it roles out its tongue and licks you. You are coated with saliva. Just an affectionate lick you hope. Indeed, the zebra had meant it only as an affectionate lick, but then it got a taste on your salty body and, unfortunately for you, equines love the taste of salt. The next lick comes with such greed that you know there's more to it than affection. You quickly turn around to run and see your comrades already doing so. The first two leaps seem promising, but on the third darkness envelopes you and you feel teeth clamp against your waist. The zebra lifts you high-up in the air. With the little light that creeps through the gap between the teeth you can make out the pulsating tongue and the hind-incisors, but beyond that there is only darkness. You struggle against the zebra's grip, but your efforts are useless as the tongue rubs against your face and the teeth press even harder on you. Outside, the people watch in horror as they see your kicking legs disappear between the lips as the zebra sucks you into its maw. Inside, your experience is worse as the zebra manipulates you with its tongue. Sometimes you scrap against the teeth, other times you are rubbed against a slimy cheek, but the worst is when the zebra presses you against the roof of its mouth and sucks on you. Warm and sticky saliva drenches your entire body. Your screams and kicks are answered only by soft neighs of pleasure. As a final effort you kick the mouth as hard as you can and this time something happens. The mouth tilts, but no the direction you want it to. You begin sliding down towards the throat! Desperately, you try to grab on to something, but unfortunately the mouth is constructed to allow food to pass on into the throat as efficiently as possible. Your body drops in and the zebra swallows.

Following the audible gulp you try to scream for help, but you voice isn't heard even as a muffle on the outside. The trip down the esophagus is horrible. Mucus gathers onto your body, the heart beats like a huge drum and as if a distant call to you, the stomach growls. You try to stop yourself from sliding, but your destination is inevitable. Slowly, you reach the stomach entrance. The esophagus pushes your head in and your nostrils are filled with the most horrendous smell imaginable. Soon you find yourself diving into the gastric juice which immediately starts eating your skin. Though you cannot see, you can feel the disgusting mush that was once grass gather around you. More mush enters the stomach and falls on top of you. You try to keep yourself above it all, but then you realize that it is only prolonging your demise. You try to think of happy things, but it is of no comfort as you writhe in pain, slowly digesting inside the zebras belly. Alive.
133211.title: From the Muzzle to the Stomach

13322.content:
Making a quick decision you run after the group. Though their direction is not the most ideal one you still realize that it is much better to remain in a group rather than go wandering off alone. Staying put was definitely not a smart idea and indeed it was not. You glance over your shoulder and see the people left behind panicking and ending up under the hooves of the zebra which was innocently trying to examine them. The group in front of you slows down to a fast paced walk and you catch up with them. This calms your nerves a bit. Working together surely would increase your chances of survival.

You do not get far when someone in the group shouts, "Look out!". Before you have a chance to react the ground sends of massive tremors as something huge slams down right behind your back. Turning around you see a giant hoof where the man next to you had stood just seconds before. Next people begin to scream as a giant muzzle descends and hungry jaws close upon a bunch of grass. Luckily, the zebra had noticed your group and tried avoid it. This is of little comfort, however, as everyone realizes that the patch of fresh grass you are standing in attracts yet more zebras. Hooves thunder around you and dust shoots into the air as the creatures push in to grab at least a mouthful. Unfortunately for some of your comrades, they find themselves being part of those mouthfuls. A small distance from you a woman gets caught in between a zebras incisors. You turn your head and spare yourself the sight. The shaking ground, the dust and the munching around you makes you loose your sense of direction so you simply dash towards whatever whole you happen to see in the ongoing chaos. More than once your instincts save you from a slamming hoof or closing jaws. To make matters worse some of the zebras notice your panic filled puny group and either through irritation of pure curiosity begin snatching people up or pinning them under their hooves which ultimately crushes them. You see somebody in running towards something and assume that he has found a way out. You dash after him only to see him getting snatched up and lifted into the air by eager lips. Despite the horror you are feeling towards that person you realize that he may have just saved your life as a perfect gap for escape opens up for you. You make a desperate final attempt which just and just succeeds. You find yourself outside the horrible conglomeration, but keep on running to get as far away as possible from the monsters. Not far off you see five survivors doing the same thing and you dash after them. You pray that nothing would go wrong.
13322.title: Fighting For Survival

133222.content: Perhaps you should not have let your guard down so soon. A zebra had noticed you run off and before you knew it you slammed right into a dirty hoof. You look up in the nick of time to see a salivating maw close upon your waist. You are jerked into the air with your legs left kicking outside. The tongue immediately slides beneath your belly and pulls you further into the humid maw. Your nostrils fill with the smell of equine breath and your body is thrown about by the merciless tongue. Saliva washes over your onto your body and even soaks your hair. There really is nothing you can do to fight back yet you still flail about violently. You are determined not to give up. As courageous as this may seem it only does enough to amuse the zebra into toying with you even more. You are greedily sucked upon and aggressively pressed against slimy cheeks. Your final hope is crushed when the zebra tilts it head back and you plummet into its throat. With no moment of respite the zebra makes an audible gulp, inevitably sending you to your foul demise of digestion.
133222.title: Just as everything seemed alright...

choices: No, you fall to the grassy floor
No, you fall into the cat's mouth
Yes, but you fall as the mouth is closed
Yes, but the cat licks her nose and you're caught
14.content: You're staring at a black wall. Confused, you get out of the bus, telling the others to stay put. Jumping down, you notice that the black wall is soft and fluffy. You sink to your knees and struggle to walk around on it. You notice a grey (not silver) line in the thing. In fact, when you look up, you notice many grey stripes on the thing you're walking on. There are two humps on a black hill ahead of you, so you go over there. When you get there, you see a pink splotch and go down to it. You see six dark grey lines coming out of it. That's when the mound you're on starts moving. That's when you realize what you're on. The fluffy thing, grey stripes, pink splotch, and dark grey lines. YOU'RE ON A TIGER! You turn and see two blood-red orbs looking down at you. You're raised into the air as the big cat yawns and you try to hold onto the cat's wet nose. Does it work?
14.title: A sleeping giant tiger, welcome to the jungle!

choices: Set it on the ground for closer inspection.
141.content: You hold on and work your way back up, heading back to the bus. You make it about halfway when a shadow covers you. You turn to see the giant cat's head looking at you. You scramble for the bus when everyone starts yelling at you. Making it to the hood, you turn to see a wall of pink headed towards you. It stops just before you and goes up. You realize the cat is grooming herself when the tongue comes down again and swoops over you. You cover your eyes and wait to be taken up, but all you feel is air rushing over you. You open your eyes and scream. The cat's face is inches from yours, occasionally licking its lips. You wave at it, then pale as it sticks its tongue out. It moves the wet muscle over to you and completely covers you with it. Taking a long lick, you're now completely soaked in the cat's saliva. You groan and wipe the fluid from your face. You hear yells behind and turn to see the tiger picking up the bus with her teeth. What does she do with it?
141.title: Yes, Somehow

143.content: You lose your grip and tumble down into a dark cavern. It's wet and humid and a giant pink wall blocks your view. You soon realize you're in its mouth, but the cat raises her head and swallows you down. You don't even make a bulge in its throat, landing in its giant stomach, filled with partially digested animals. The stomach growls then clenches. You hear hacking sounds, and the contents swirl around you.
143.title: No, you fall into the cat's mouth

145.content: You do manage to hold on, but a giant pink wall slides into your view beside you and suddenly you're stuck to it. You're dragged into the cat's mouth and lay there for a moment. The world tilts and you're falling, landing on your back on among tall blades of grass. You look up to see the big cat's eyes trained on you.
145.title: Yes, but the cat licks her nose and you're ...

info.brief_description: You're shrunk, and these animals are looking for a meal... YOU!
info.description:
Welcome all!

Basic Plot: You're riding on a bus, when all of a sudden, a flash of light knocks everyone out, and you wake up in one of the following locations:

Farm
Forest
Jungle
Savannah

Rules:

Basically, if you're going to write an ending, try to make it as long as you can.

Remember, you're shrunk near these animals, and while there's many ways to die, this story is mostly about being eaten by animals. Feel free to describe the entire digestive process if you want! ^^
